Articles.Content: In the current version, is there some way you can get stuff you\'ve set into orbit, besides your active craft, to show up on the new \'orbital map\' screen?

It\'s an upcoming feature, I\'m sure. Sorry to repost because I may of said this more than once in other threads, but I suggested the idea that either A), orbjects can be tracked using a service module attached to rocket that can be deployed, , some sort of scanning service modules on your rocket to detect space junk of sorts, or C), all of the above.
